entity.label: activedeploy
entity.description: Update your running apps with zero downtime, or quickly revert to your original version.

extra.longDescription: Active Deploy allows you to release a new version of your software with no down time. If at any time during the release a problem occurs, Active Deploy allows you to quickly revert back to the original version. You finalize the new version only when it has shown to work properly.

media.caption: Get Started with the Command Line Interface

entity.label: alchemy_api
entity.description: An AlchemyAPI service that analyzes your unstructured text and image content

extra.longDescription: AlchemyAPI offers a set of three services that enable businesses and developers to build cognitive applications that understand the content and context within text and images. For instance, using AlchemyAPI, developers can perform tasks such as extracting the people, places, companies, and other entities mentioned in a news article or analyze an image to understand the contents of the photo.

bullets.title: AlchemyLanguage
bullets.description: AlchemyLanguage is a collection of APIs that offer text analysis through natural language processing. The AlchemyLanguage APIs can process text and help you to understand its sentiment, emotions (Beta), keywords, entities, high-level concepts and more. This service now includes Emotion Analysis, currently in Beta.

bullets.title: AlchemyVision
bullets.description: AlchemyVision understands and analyzes complex visual scenes without needing textual clues. Developers can use this API to do tasks like image recognition, scene recognition, and understanding the objects within images.

bullets.title: AlchemyData
bullets.description: AlchemyData provides news and blog content enriched with natural language processing to allow for highly targeted search and trend analysis. Now you can query the world's news sources and blogs like a database.

media.caption: AlchemyLanguage
AlchemyVision

entity.label: Analytics for Apache Hadoop
entity.description: IBM Analytics for Apache Hadoop is a quick and free option to try Apache Hadoop and BigInsights. For production use or proof of concept at scale, use the IBM BigInsights for Apache Hadoop service.

extra.longDescription: IBM Analytics for Apache Hadoop combines the power of 100% open source Apache Hadoop technology and Hadoop analytics capabilities from IBM BigInsights for Apache Hadoop to deliver insights across your organization. It provides a 2-node Hadoop cluster. IBM Analytics for Apache Hadoop is an extremely quick and simple way to try out BigInsights features without having to worry about installing, configuring, or administering a Hadoop cluster. For production use or enterprise-level POCs, use the IBM BigInsights for Apache Hadoop Bluemix service and provision one or more scalable clusters on bare metal hardware.

pt-BR.label: Analytics for Apache Hadoop

metadata.longDescription: Veja como o IBM® BigInsights™ entrega o Hadoop de classificação corporativa. Experimente os recursos do IBM BigInsights em uma VM de nó único, completamente configurada e gerenciada pela IBM. Este serviço grátis é baseado no InfoSphere BigInsights, que é construído no Hadoop de software livre e inclui recursos de analítica corporativa e muito mais. Para POCs de uso de produção ou de nível corporativo, use o serviço BigInsights Bluemix para aprovisionar um ou mais clusters escaláveis no hardware bare metal.

bullets.title: Construa aplicativos Big Data de forma imediata!
bullets.description: Este serviço fornece uma maneira fácil de acessar dados em clusters do Hadoop, construir aplicativos e analisar dados estruturados e não estruturados. Visualize suas descobertas em diagramas e gráficos. É possível trazer seus dados para o Hadoop para análise sem se preocupar com a definição ou a configuração do Hadoop.

bullets.title: Construa em tecnologia de software livre
bullets.description: Este serviço é desenvolvido com o InfoSphere® BigInsights™, que se baseia no Hadoop de software livre. Ele fornece recursos de software livre de Hive, de MapReduce, de Pig e de outros. Além disso, é possível acessar recursos corporativos do BigInsights, incluindo Big SQL, BigSheets, Text Analytics e muito mais.

media.caption: Tela de boas-vindas
Tela do BigSheets mostrando uma visualização de planilha
Tela do console de consulta do Big SQL
Visualizando dados usando diagramas e mapas do BigSheets
Tela do aplicativo CloudantSync

de.label: Analytics for Apache Hadoop

metadata.longDescription: Erleben Sie, wie IBM® BigInsights™ Hadoop in Unternehmensqualität bereitstellt. Probieren Sie die Features von IBM BigInsights in einer Einzelknoten-VM aus, die komplett von IBM konfiguriert und verwaltet wird. Dieser kostenlose Service basiert auf InfoSphere BigInsights, das wiederum auf dem Open-Source-Hadoop basiert; es umfasst viele Funktionen, darunter eine Funktionalität zur Unternehmensanalyse. Zur produktiven Nutzung bzw. für POCs auf Unternehmensebene verwenden Sie den BigInsights-Service von Bluemix zur Bereitstellung mindestens eines skalierbaren Clusters auf Bare-Metal-Hardware.

bullets.title: Big Data-Anwendungen unmittelbar erstellen!
bullets.description: Durch diesen Service ist ein einfacher Zugriff auf Daten in Hadoop-Clustern, die Erstellung von Anwendungen und das Analysieren von strukturierten oder nicht strukturierten Daten möglich. Stellen Sie Ihre Ergebnisse in Digrammen und Grafiken visuell dar. Sie können Ihre Daten zu Analysezwecken in Hadoop einbringen, ohne sich Gedanken über die Einrichtung oder Konfiguration von Hadoop machen zu müssen.

bullets.title: Open-Source-Technologie als Grundlage
bullets.description: Dieser Service basiert auf InfoSphere® BigInsights™; dieses wiederum basiert auf dem Open-Source-Hadoop. Es werden die Open-Source-Funktionen von Hive, MapReduce, Pig usw. bereitgestellt. Außerdem ist ein Zugriff auf Unternehmensfunktionen aus BigInsights einschließlich Big SQL, BigSheets, Textanalysen usw. möglich.

es.label: Analytics for Apache Hadoop

metadata.longDescription: Vea cómo IBM® BigInsights™ proporciona Hadoop de calidad empresarial. Pruebe las características de IBM BigInsights en una VM de un único nodo, completamente configurada y gestionada por IBM. Este servicio gratuito está basado en InfoSphere BigInsights, creado sobre Hadoop de código abierto e incorpora capacidades de analítica empresarial, entre otras. Para uso en producción o pruebas de concepto a nivel de empresa, utilice el servicio BigInsights Bluemix para suministrar uno o más clústeres escalables en hardware nativo.

bullets.title: ¡Cree aplicaciones Big Data de inmediato!
bullets.description: Este servicio ofrece un modo sencillo de acceder a los datos en clústeres Hadoop, de crear aplicaciones y de analizar datos estructurados y no estructurados. Visualice sus hallazgos en diagramas y gráficos. Puede incorporar datos en Hadoop para analizarlos sin preocuparse de configurar Hadoop.

bullets.title: Basado en tecnología de código abierto
bullets.description: Este servicio se basa en InfoSphere® BigInsights™, que a su vez se basa en Hadoop de código abierto. Ofrece las funciones de código abierto de Hive, MapReduce, Pig y otros. Además, puede acceder a las funciones de la empresa desde BigInsights, incluidos Big SQL, BigSheets, Text Analytics y más.

it.label: Analytics for Apache Hadoop

metadata.longDescription: Scopri come IBM® BigInsights™ offre Hadoop a livello aziendale. Fornisce le funzioni di IBM BigInsights in una singola VM del nodo, interamente configurata e gestita da IBM. Questo servizio gratuito si basa su InfoSphere BigInsights, che è costruito sull'open source Hadoop e include funzionalità analitiche aziendali e molto altro. Per i POC a livello aziendale o per l'uso in produzione, utilizzare il servizio BigInsights Bluemix per fornire uno o più cluster scalabili sull'hardware bare metal.

bullets.title: Creazione immediata di applicazioni Big Data.
bullets.description: Questo servizio fornisce un metodo semplice per accedere ai dati sui cluster Hadoop, creare applicazioni e analizzare dati strutturati o non strutturati. I risultati vengono visualizzati in tabelle e grafici. È possibile inserire i propri dati in Hadoop per l'analisi senza preoccuparsi dell'impostazione o configurazione del servizio.

bullets.title: Basato sulla tecnologia open source
bullets.description: Questo servizio utilizza la tecnologia di InfoSphere® BigInsights™, che è basato sull'open source Hadoop. Fornisce le funzionalità open source di Hive, MapReduce, Pig e altri. Inoltre, è possibile accedere alle funzionalità aziendali da BigInsights, tra cui Big SQL, BigSheets, Text Analytics e molte altre.

fr.label: Analytics for Apache Hadoop

metadata.longDescription: Découvrez comment IBM® BigInsights™ propose Hadoop au niveau entreprise. Testez les fonctions de IBM BigInsights avec une machine virtuelle à noeud unique, totalement configurée et gérée par IBM. Ce service gratuit utilise InfoSphere BigInsights, produit basé sur Hadoop en open source, qui inclut des fonctions d'analyse d'entreprise entre autres. Pour l'utilisation en production ou les points de contact de niveau entreprise, utilisez le service BigInsights Bluemix pour mettre à disposition un ou plusieurs clusters évolutifs sur du matériel bare metal.

bullets.title: Créez vos applications Big Data sans attendre !
bullets.description: Ce service permet, en toute simplicité, d'accéder aux données de clusters Hadoop, de créer des applications et d'analyser des données structurées ou non structurées. Visualisez vos résultats dans des diagrammes et des graphiques. Vous pouvez importer vos données dans Hadoop sans souci d'installation ou de configuration de Hadoop.

bullets.title: Basé sur la technologie open source
bullets.description: Ce service fonctionne avec InfoSphere® BigInsights™, basé sur Hadoop en open source. Il offre des fonctions open source de Hive, MapReduce ou Pig, entre autres. Vous pouvez aussi accéder à des fonctions d'entreprise depuis BigInsights, par exemple Big SQL, BigSheets, Text Analytics, etc.

ja.label: Analytics for Apache Hadoop

metadata.longDescription: IBM® BigInsights™ が、どのようにして企業レベルの Hadoop を実現しているかをご覧ください。IBM によって完全に構成され管理されている単一ノードの VM で IBM BigInsights の機能をお試しください。この無料サービスは、オープン・ソース Hadoop 上に構築されていて、企業分析機能などが含まれる InfoSphere BigInsights に基づいています。実稼働使用や企業レベルの POC については、BigInsights Bluemix サービスを使用して、ベア・メタル・ハードウェアに 1 つ以上の拡張が容易なクラスターをプロビジョンしてください。

bullets.title: ビッグデータ・アプリケーションをすばやく作成!
bullets.description: このサービスは、Hadoop クラスター上のデータへのアクセス、アプリケーションの作成、構造化データと非構造化データの分析を簡単に行えます。図表やグラフにより、分析結果を視覚的に表示します。Hadoop の設定や構成に関する知識がなくても、データを Hadoop に取り込んで分析することができます。

bullets.title: オープン・ソース・テクノロジーに基づいた設計
bullets.description: このサービスは、オープン・ソース Hadoop をベースとした InfoSphere BigInsights™ を使用して開発されています。このサービスは、Hive、MapReduce、Pig などのオープン・ソース機能を提供します。BigInsights から、Big SQL、BigSheets、Text Analytics などのエンタープライズ機能にアクセスすることも可能です。

zh-Hant.label: Analytics for Apache Hadoop

metadata.longDescription: 看看 IBM® BigInsights™ 如何提供企業級的 Hadoop。在單一節點 VM 試試 IBM BigInsights 的特性，這個 VM 完全由 IBM 進行配置與管理。這項免費服務是以 InfoSphere BigInsights 為基礎，它建置在開放程式碼的 Hadoop 上，並且包含企業分析功能與其他功能。如需正式作業使用或企業層級的 POC，請使用 BigInsights Bluemix 服務，在裸機硬體上供應一個以上的可調式叢集。

bullets.title: 立即建置 Big Data 應用程式！
bullets.description: 這個服務能提供輕鬆的方法以存取 Hadoop 叢集上的資料、建置應用程式，以及分析結構化或非結構化的資料。以圖表和圖形將您的發現項目視覺化。您可以將資料帶進 Hadoop 進行分析，而不必擔心設定或配置 Hadoop。

bullets.title: 利用開放程式碼技術進行建置
bullets.description: 這個服務採用 InfoSphere® BigInsights™ 技術，它是以開放程式碼的 Hadoop 為基礎。它提供 Hive、MapReduce、Pig 及其他的開放程式碼功能。此外，您可以從 BigInsights 存取企業級功能，包括 Big SQL、BigSheets、Text Analytics 等等。

entity.label: spark
entity.description: IBM Analytics for Apache Spark for Bluemix.

extra.longDescription: Apache Spark is an open source cluster computing framework optimized for extremely fast and large scale data processing, which you can access via the newly integrated notebook interface IBM Analytics for Apache Spark. You can connect to your existing data sources or take advantage of the on-demand big data optimization of Object Storage. Spark plans are based on the maximum number of executors available to process your analytic jobs. Executors exist only as long as they're needed for processing, so you're charged only for processing done.

bullets.description: Apache Spark delivers 100x the performance of Apache Hadoop for certain workloads because of its advanced in-memory computing engine.
bullets.title: Incredibly Fast

bullets.description: Apache Spark's Streaming and SQL programming models backed by MLlib and GraphX make it incredibly easy for developers and data scientists to build apps that exploit machine learning and graph analytics. Because the service is 100% compatible with Apache Spark, developers can build their apps and run them against the IBM managed service to benefit from operational, maintenance, and hardware excellence.
bullets.title: Easy to Use and Powerful

bullets.description: Object Storage enables a convenient way to upload your data from a file for immediate use by your Spark instance. You can set up Object Storage directly from the Spark service interface.
bullets.title: Convenient Data Storage

entity.label: apersona-amfa
entity.description: Frictionless Adaptive Multi-Factor Authentication

extra.longDescription: Prevent credential fraud. aPersona's Adaptive Security Manager transparently protects your users from stolen ID’s and Passwords.

entity.label: apiHarmony
entity.description: IBM API Harmony for Bluemix supports developers in identifying and selecting APIs.

extra.longDescription: IBM API Harmony for Bluemix supports developers in identifying and selecting APIs. It reveals relationships of already selected and searched for APIs, guiding developers in finding useful API combinations.

entity.label: API Management
entity.description: Publish, manage, and consume APIs.

extra.longDescription: The API Management service enables developers and organizations to manage and enforce policies around the consumption of their business services. Use an existing API, or design a new API; then apply security controls, set rate limits, test APIs in place, and finally publish these "managed APIs" on Bluemix--either to yourself or to select developer organizations--or to app developers outside of Bluemix. Share your APIs using an available self-service portal that can be white-labeled and provides built-in support for blogs, discussion forums, comments, ratings, FAQs, and the APIs that you choose to publish. This service includes API versioning, lifecycle management, and API usage analytics.

bullets.title: Discover Existing APIs
bullets.description: Easily find and expose REST and SOAP services by discovering them from custom registries, such as those on z/OS. Then manage, track, and limit the discovered services.

bullets.title: Design New APIs
bullets.description: Composite multiple existing APIs into a new, more powerful API. Import APIs from Swagger or WSDL definitions, or build one from scratch.

de.description: Veröffentlichen, verwalten und verarbeiten Sie APIs.

metadata.longDescription: Dank des API Management-Services können Sie APIs über einen konfigurationsbasierten Ansatz schnell erstellen, implementieren und gemeinsam nutzen. Es handelt sich um eine einfache und verbraucherfreundliche Methode, um den Zugriff auf APIs zu steuern, mehrere API-Versionen zu verwalten, Bandbreiten zu begrenzen und schließlich die Leistungsmetriken und Analyse jeder API in Ihrem Portfolio nachzuverfolgen.

bullets.title: Erkennen Sie vorhandene APIs
bullets.description: Suchen Sie mühelos REST- und SOAP-Services und präsentieren Sie diese, indem Sie sie auf benutzerdefinierten Registrys erkennen, z. B. auf z/OS. Anschließend verwalten, verfolgen und begrenzen Sie die erkannten Services.

bullets.title: Neue APIs entwerfen
bullets.description: Führen Sie mehrere vorhandene APIs in einer neuen, leistungsfähigeren API zusammen. Importieren Sie APIs aus Swagger- oder WADL-Definitionen oder entwerfen Sie eine völlig neue API.

metadata.longDescription: The API Management Service allows you to rapidly create, deploy, and share APIs through a configuration based approach. It provides a simple and consumable way of controlling API access, managing multiple versions of an API, establishing rate limits, and ultimately tracking the performance metrics and analytics of each API in your portfolio.

metadata.longDescription: Le service API Management permet de créer, de déployer et de partager des API rapidement selon une approche reposant sur la configuration. ko.description: API를 공개하고 관리하고 이용하십시오.

metadata.longDescription: API 관리 서비스를 사용하면 구성 기반 접근 방법을 통해 API를 빠르게 작성하고 배치하고 공유할 수 있습니다. 이는 API 액세스 제어, 다중 API 버전 관리, 등급 한계 설정 및 궁극적으로 사용자의 포트폴리오에 있는 각 API의 성능 메트릭 및 분석 추적을 위한 단순하고 이용 가능한 방법을 제공합니다.

entity.label: Application Security on Cloud
entity.description: A robust, practical security vulnerability assessment for your web applications.

extra.longDescription: IBM Application Security on Cloud helps secure your organization's applications by detecting dozens of today's most pervasive published security vulnerabilities. As such, it helps to eliminate vulnerabilities from applications before they are placed into production and deployed. Convenient, detailed reporting permits you to effectively address vulnerabilities that are found, enabling application users to benefit from a more secure experience.

bullets.title: Identify vulnerabilities before release
bullets.description: Scans applications at the appropriate stage of your development lifecycle.

bullets.title: Prioritize based on potential business impact
bullets.description: Identifies security vulnerabilities to real threats, permitting you to focus on vulnerabilities that are most likely to have a significant impact on your organization.

bullets.title: Quickly remedy with built in recommendations
bullets.description: Delivers a detailed report that provides an executive summary, isolates critical issues and offers recommendations for remediation.

media.caption: Select your Web Application
Enter Login Credentials
Security Report

zh-Hans.description: 对 Web 应用程序的强健且实用的安全漏洞评估。

metadata.longDescription: IBM Application Security on Cloud 可通过检测数十种目前无所不在的已发布安全漏洞来帮助保护您的组织。因此，可帮助您消除应用程序中的漏洞，以避免漏洞进入生产环境并被部署。方便且详细的报告使您可以有效解决发现的漏洞，式应用程序用户能够受益于更安全的体验。

bullets.title: 2 个简单步骤
bullets.description: 选择 Web 应用程序。如果需要，请输入登录凭证。一旦扫描完成，便下载安全报告以帮助您修复检测到的漏洞。

bullets.title: 安全性和准确性
bullets.description: 基于 IBM 丰富的应用程序安全经验，IBM Security AppScan 服务能够识别数十种漏洞，并且准确性很高。

media.caption: 选择 Web 应用程序
输入登录凭证
安全报告

plans.description: 该计划使您能够免费试用 Application Security on Cloud。每个扫描限制为最多 4 小时，将在该时间之后停止。一次仅能运行一个扫描。

bullets: 每月生成结果摘要报告的 10 个安全漏洞扫描

plans.name: free

plans.description: 该计划包含使用“Application Security on Cloud”技术进行应用程序的不受限制的全面安全性扫描。其他成本将应用于扫描其他应用程序，或运行其他类型的扫描。

bullets: 应用程序的全面安全扫描
详细安全报告

plans.name: standard

de.description: Eine leistungsfähige, praktische Bewertung der Sicherheitslücken für Ihre Webanwendungen.

metadata.longDescription: Mit IBM Application Security on Cloud können Sie die Anwendungen Ihrer Organisation sichern und eine Vielzahl der aktuellen, weit verbreitetsten Sicherheitslücken aufdecken. Dieses Programm unterstützt Sie bei der Beseitigung von Sicherheitslücken aus Anwendungen noch bevor diese in die Produktion gehen und bereitgestellt werden. Mithilfe von zweckdienlichen und ausführlichen Berichten können Sie festgestellte Sicherheitslücken unverzüglich beheben und die Anwendungsbenutzer profitieren von einem sichereren Zugriff.

bullets.title: 2 einfache Schritte
bullets.description: Wählen Sie einfach Ihre Webanwendung aus. Geben Sie ggf. Anmeldeberechtigungsnachweise ein. Wenn der Scan abgeschlossen ist, laden Sie einen Sicherheitsbericht herunter, der Ihnen dabei hilft, die erkannten Schwachstellen zu korrigieren.

bullets.title: Sicherheit & Genauigkeit
bullets.description: Basierend auf der langjährigen Expertise von IBM bei Fragen der Anwendungssicherheit sind die Services von IBM Security AppScan in der Lage, Hunderte von Schwachstellen mit einem hohen Grad an Genauigkeit zu erkennen.

media.caption: Webanwendung auswählen
Anmeldeberechtigungsnachweise eingeben
Sicherheitsbericht

plans.description: Mit diesem Plan können Sie Application Security on Cloud gebührenfrei ausprobieren. Die Scans sind auf jeweils maximal vier Stunden begrenzt und werden danach gestoppt. Es kann immer nur ein Scan ausgeführt werden.

bullets: 10 Sicherheitslückenscans pro Monat, die einen Übersichtsbericht der Ergebnisse liefern

plans.name: free

plans.description: Dieser Plan schließt eine unbegrenzte Anzahl umfassender Sicherheitsscans Ihrer Anwendung mithilfe einer der Application Security on Cloud-Technologien ein. Zusätzliche Kosten werden anfallen, um eine andere Anwendung zu scannen oder um einen anderen Typ von Scan auszuführen.

bullets: Umfassender Sicherheitsscan Ihrer Anwendung
Detaillierter Sicherheitsbericht

plans.name: standard

fr.description: Evaluation des vulnérabilités en matière de sécurité robuste et pratique pour vos applications Web.

metadata.longDescription: IBM Application Security on Cloud permet de sécuriser les applications de votre organisation en détectant des douzaines de vulnérabilités en matière de sécurité actuelles classées parmi les plus invasives. A ce titre, cette application contribue à éliminer les vulnérabilités des applications avant que celles-ci ne soient placées en production et déployées. Un rapport détaillé et pratique vous permet de traiter les vulnérabilités trouvées, en activant les utilisateurs d'application afin de bénéficier d'une expérience plus sécurisée.

bullets.title: 2 étapes simples
bullets.description: Sélectionnez simplement votre application Web. Si nécessaire, entrez vos données d'identification de connexion. Une fois l'examen terminé, téléchargez un rapport de sécurité qui vous aidera à remédier aux vulnérabilités détectées.

bullets.title: Sécurité et précision
bullets.description: Les services IBM Security AppScan, qui s'appuient sur l'expérience significative d'IBM en matière de sécurité des applications, sont capables d'identifier des douzaines de vulnérabilités, avec une grande précision.

media.caption: Sélectionnez votre application Web
Entrez vos données d'identification de connexion
Rapport de sécurité

plans.description: Cette offre vous permet d'essayer Application Security on Cloud sans frais. Les examens sont limités à quatre heures maximum chacun et s'arrêteront après cette durée. Seulement un examen peut être exécuté à la fois.

bullets: 10 examens de vulnérabilité en matière de sécurité par mois qui génèrent un rapport récapitulatif des résultats

plans.name: free

plans.description: Ce plan inclut des examens de sécurité de votre application complets et illimités utilisant les technologies "Application Security on Cloud". Des coûts supplémentaires peuvent être appliqués à l'examen d'une application différente ou à l'exécution d'un type d'examen différent.

bullets: Examen de sécurité complet de votre application
Rapport de sécurité détaillé

plans.name: standard

it.description: Una valutazione della vulnerabilità della sicurezza pratica e affidabile per le applicazioni web.

metadata.longDescription: IBM Application Security on Cloud consente di proteggere le applicazioni aziendali rilevando molte delle vulnerabilità di sicurezza pubblicate più diffuse oggigiorno. In quanto tale, consente di eliminare le vulnerabilità dalle applicazioni prima che queste vengano messe in produzione e distribuite. Un sistema di notifica comodo e dettagliato consente di occuparsi in modo efficace delle vulnerabilità rilevate, consentendo agli utenti dell'applicazione di beneficiare di un'esperienza più sicura.

bullets.title: 2 semplici operazioni
bullets.description: Selezionare l'applicazione web. Se necessario, immettere le credenziali per il login. Una volta completata la scansione, eseguire il download di un report di sicurezza come ausilio per superare le vulnerabilità rilevate.

bullets.title: Sicurezza e accuratezza
bullets.description: Sulla base dell'importante esperienza sulla sicurezza delle applicazioni di IBM, i servizi di IBM Security AppScan sono in grado di identificare numerose vulnerabilità, con un elevato livello di accuratezza.

media.caption: Seleziona l'applicazione web
Immetti le credenziali per il login
Report Sicurezza

plans.description: Questo piano consente di provare Application Security on Cloud senza alcun addebito. Le scansioni sono limitate ad un massimo di quattro ore ciascuna e verranno arrestate trascorso tale periodo di tempo. Può essere eseguita solo una scansione alla volta.

bullets: 10 scansioni di vulnerabilità di sicurezza al mese che generano un report di riepilogo delle ricerche

plans.name: free

plans.description: Questo piano include scansioni di sicurezza complete illimitate dell'applicazione utilizzando una delle tecnologie "Application Security on Cloud". Verranno applicati costi aggiuntivi a scansioni con una diversa applicazione oppure per eseguire un tipo diverso di scansione.

bullets: Scansione della sicurezza completa dell'applicazione
Report sulla sicurezza dettagliato

plans.name: standard

ja.description: Web アプリケーションに関する堅固で実用的なセキュリティー脆弱性の評価

metadata.longDescription: IBM Application Security on Cloud は、今日、最も広範囲に公開されている多数のセキュリティー脆弱性を検出することで、組織のアプリケーションを保護するのに役立ちます。 そのため、アプリケーションが実動環境に配置されたりデプロイされたりする前に、そのアプリケーションから脆弱性を除去することができます。 便利な詳細レポートにより、検出された脆弱性に効率的に対処することができ、アプリケーション・ユーザーがよりセキュアな経験から得られたメリットを享受することができます。

bullets.title: 2 つの簡単なステップ
bullets.description: Web アプリケーションを選択します。 必要な場合はログイン資格情報を入力します。 スキャンを完了したら、検出された脆弱性を修復するためのセキュリティー・レポートをダウンロードします。

bullets.title: セキュリティーと正確性
bullets.description: アプリケーション・セキュリティーに関する IBM の顕著な実績を基に、IBM Security Appscan サービスでは、多くの脆弱性を高精度で識別することができます。

media.caption: Web アプリケーションの選択
ログイン資格情報の入力
セキュリティー・レポート

plans.description: このプランでは、無料で Application Security on Cloud 回試行できます。 スキャンは、最大 4 時間ごとに制限され、それ以降は停止します。 同時に実行できるのは 1 つのスキャンのみです。

bullets: 1 カ月に10 回のセキュリティー脆弱点スキャン (検出結果の概要レポートを作成)

plans.name: free

plans.description: この計画には、「Application Security on Cloud」テクノロジーのいずれかを使用する、アプリケーションの無制限の包括的なセキュリティー・スキャンが含まれます。 異なるアプリケーションをスキャンする場合、または異なるタイプのスキャンを実行する場合には、追加コストが適用されます。

bullets: アプリケーションの包括的なセキュリティー・スキャン
詳細なセキュリティー・レポート

plans.name: standard

ko.description: 웹 애플리케이션에 대한 강력하고 실용적인 보안 취약성 평가입니다.

metadata.longDescription: IBM Application Security on Cloud는 오늘 날 가장 많이 퍼져있는 여러 보안 취약점을 발견하여 사용자 조직의 애플리케이션을 보호하는 데 도움을 줍니다. 따라서 프로덕션에 포함되고 배치되기 전에 애플리케이션으로부터 취약점을 제거하도록 도와줍니다. 사용하기 편리하고 세부적인 보고서 작성 기능��� 통해  발견된 취약점을 효과적으로 해결하고 애플리케이션 사용자가 더 안전하게 사용할 수 있도록 합니다.

bullets.title: 간단한 두 단계
bullets.description: 웹 애플리케이션을 선택하십시오. 필요하면 로그인 신임 정보를 입력하십시오. 스캔이 완료되면 발견된 취약점을 개선할 수 있도록 지원하는 보안 보고서를 다운로드하십시오.

bullets.title: 보안 및 정확성
bullets.description: IBM의 축적된 애플리케이션 보안 경험을 기반으로 하는 IBM Security AppScan 서비스는 수십 가지 취약점을 매우 정확하게 식별할 수 있습니다.

media.caption: 웹 애플리케이션 선택
로그인 신임 정보 입력
보안 보고서

plans.description: 이 계획을 사용하면 무료로 Application Security on Cloud을(를) 사용해 볼 수 있습니다. 스캔은 각각 최대 4시간으로 제한되며 이 시간이 지나면 중지됩니다. 한 번에 하나의 스캔만 실행할 수 있습니다.

bullets: 찾은 결과의 요약 보고서를 생성하는 월별 10가지 보안 취약성 스캔

plans.name: free

plans.description: 이 계획에는 "Application Security on Cloud" 기술 중 하나를 사용하는 애플리케이션에 대한 무제한 포괄적인 보안 스캔이 포함됩니다. 다른 애플리케이션을 스캔하거나 다른 유형의 스캔을 실행하려는 경우 추가 비용이 적용됩니다.

bullets: 애플리케이션에 대한 포괄적인 보안 스캔
상세한 보안 보고서

plans.name: standard

pt-BR.description: Uma avaliação de vulnerabilidade de segurança robusta e prática para seus aplicativos da web.

metadata.longDescription:
IBM Application Security
on Cloud ajuda a proteger aplicativos de sua organização através da
detecção de dezenas de vulnerabilidades de segurança publicadas mais
difundidas atualmente. Como tal, ele ajudará a eliminar as
vulnerabilidades de aplicativos antes que eles sejam colocados em produção e implementados. Conveniente,
relatórios detalhados permitem que você direcione efetivamente
vulnerabilidades localizadas, permitindo que os usuários do aplicativo
se beneficiem de uma experiência mais segura.

bullets.title: 2 etapas simples
bullets.description: Basta selecionar seu aplicativo da web. Se necessário, insira as credenciais de login. Depois que a varredura for concluída, faça download de um relatório de segurança para ajudá-lo a corrigir vulnerabilidades detectadas.

bullets.title: Segurança e Precisão
bullets.description: Com base na significativa experiência de segurança do aplicativo da IBM, os serviços IBM Security AppScan são capazes de identificar dúzias de vulnerabilidades, com um alto grau de precisão.

media.caption: Selecione seu aplicativo da web
Insira as credenciais de login
Relatório de Segurança

plans.description: Este plano permite testar Application Security on Cloud sem encargos. As varreduras estão limitadas a um máximo de quatro horas cada e irão parar após esse tempo. Somente uma varredura pode ser executada por vez.

bullets: 10 varreduras de vulnerabilidade de segurança por mês que produzem relatório de resumo das provas

plans.name: free

bullets: Varredura de segurança abrangente de seu aplicativo
Relatório de segurança detalhado

es.description: Una potente y práctica evaluación de vulnerabilidades de seguridad de sus aplicaciones web.

metadata.longDescription: IBM Application Security on Cloud ayuda a proteger las aplicaciones de la organización detectando decenas de las vulnerabilidades de seguridad publicadas más generalizadas hoy en día. Como tal, ayuda a eliminar vulnerabilidades de aplicaciones antes de que se coloquen en producción y que se desplieguen. La creación de informes conveniente y detallada le permite solucionar de forma efectiva vulnerabilidades que se encuentren, habilitando a los usuarios de la aplicación a beneficiarse de una experiencia más segura.

bullets.title: 2 pasos sencillos

metadata.longDescription: IBM Application Security on Cloud 可偵測許多現今大部分普遍發佈的安全漏洞，幫助保護您組織的應用程式。確切而言，它是在應用程式放到正式環境和部署之前，幫助刪除應用程式中的漏洞。便利、詳細的報告可讓您有效地處理發現的漏洞，讓應用程式使用者可以獲得更安全的體驗。

bullets.title: 2 個簡單的步驟

entity.label: ecs-dashboard
entity.description: Integrate automated accessibility auditing and reporting capabilities into your deployment DevOps processes.

extra.longDescription:
Incorporate automated accessibility reporting and auditing capabilities directly within your testing environment to quickly remediate accessibility violations before an application is deployed. Works seamlessly with the Selenium testing framework so development teams can add accessibility checkpoints to run during agile development.

The Automated Accessibility Tester is intended to be used with test systems and test/staging data. The Automated Accessibility Tester will take screen shots in order to assist your team in identifying where accessibility issues occur. Use with production data could inadvertently cause personal information to be capture by these screen shots.

bullets.title: Detailed Reporting
bullets.description: Gain insights into the accessibility of all development projects and track accessibility over time as requirements change.

bullets.title: Continuous Testing
bullets.description: Improves quality of testing environments by allowing developers to perform testing as changes are made to an application.

entity.label: BigInsightsonCloud
entity.description: Provision managed bare metal Apache Hadoop clusters for production use or POCs at scale.

extra.longDescription: Develop analytics applications by using open source Apache Hadoop and BigInsights™ APIs without having to manage the platform. The service is managed and scaled for you by the Big Data experts at IBM®.

bullets.title: Power of open source innovation
bullets.description: This service provides 100% open source Apache Hadoop through the IBM Open Platform. It is updated regularly to provide the best versions of the Apache Hadoop ecosystem components, including, among others, Ambari, YARN, Spark, Knox, HBase, Hive, and an encrypted HDFS.

bullets.title: Focus on delivering insights
bullets.description: Key components of the platform, including the infrastructure, are proactively monitored by a 24x7 cloud operations team. Critical security fixes, high severity patches, and defect resolutions are promptly applied on the cluster. Take advantage of high value Hadoop analytics features such as Big SQL, BigSheets, Text Analytics, Big R, and Machine Learning to gain insight faster.

media.caption: Define BigInsights for Hadoop Cluster
BigInsights for Hadoop Cluster Topology
Manage BigInsights for Hadoop Clusters
BigInsights for Hadoop Cluster Details
Visualize Your Data in BigInsights for Hadoop

entity.label: blazemeter
entity.description: Performance Testing Platform

extra.longDescription:
BlazeMeter is a self-service, web and mobile load testing platform
(PaaS) providing developers an enterprise grade, out-of-the-box load
testing solution that’s 100% compatible with Apache JMeter™. Start
testing in under five minutes.

entity.label: ibm-blockchain-4-prod
entity.description: Utilize IBM's Blockchain Technology within Bluemix

extra.longDescription: Blockchain is a peer to peer distributed ledger technology for a new generation of transactional applications that establishes trust, accountability and transparency while streamlining business processes. Think of it as an operating system for interactions. It has the potential to vastly reduce the cost and complexity of getting things done. The distributed ledger makes it easier to create cost-efficient business networks where virtually anything of value can be tracked and traded, without requiring a central point of control.

bullets.title: Spin up a test Blockchain Network in one click
bullets.description: Spend less time worrying about creating and managing a blockchain network and more time focusing on making your applications. Then access the permanent ledger to put your transaction log to work in analytics.

bullets.title: Obtain a secure identity
bullets.description: Take advantage of our first implementation of the membership service module, which encompasses many of the latest advances in cryptography.

bullets.title: Create private and confidential digital assets
bullets.description: Create digital transactions in your test applications that are processed quickly and securely over your private and confidential permissioned network.

bullets.title: Work with chain-code
bullets.description: Which is embedded business logic that allows you to define assets and write transaction instructions.

entity.description: Powering Content and data for your application.  Whether you are building a line of business app, content management software or need to display content beautifully on web and mobile, the Box API can help power the content and data layer of your application.

entity.label: cloudantNoSQLDB
entity.description: Cloudant NoSQL DB provides access to a fully managed NoSQL JSON data layer that's always on. This service is compatible with CouchDB, and accessible through a simple to use HTTP interface for mobile and web application models

extra.longDescription: Cloudant NoSQL DB provides access to a fully managed NoSQL JSON data layer that's always on. This service is compatible with CouchDB, and accessible through a simple to use HTTP interface for mobile and web application models

de.description: Mit Cloudant NoSQL DB kann auf eine komplett verwaltete NoSQL-JSON-Datenebene zugegriffen werden, die stets aktiv ist. Dieser Service ist mit CouchDB kompatibel; auf den Service kann über eine einfach anzuwendende HTTP-Schnittstelle für mobile und Webanwendungsmodelle zugegriffen werden

metadata.longDescription: Mit Cloudant NoSQL DB kann auf eine komplett verwaltete NoSQL-JSON-Datenebene zugegriffen werden, die stets aktiv ist. Dieser Service ist mit CouchDB kompatibel; auf den Service kann über eine einfach anzuwendende HTTP-Schnittstelle für mobile und Webanwendungsmodelle zugegriffen werden

bullets.title: Einfache Durchführbarkeit
bullets.description: Sie können über eine REST-konforme API mit selbst beschreibenden JSON-Dokumenten arbeiten; dadurch kann auf jedes Dokument in Ihrer Cloudant-Datenbank über eine URL im JSON-Format zugegriffen werden.  Dokumente können einzeln oder gesammelt abgerufen, gespeichert oder gelöscht werden; außerdem können ihnen Dateien angehängt sein. IBM kümmert sich um Bereitstellung, Management und Skalierbarkeit des Datenspeichers, wodurch Sie mehr Zeit für Ihre Anwendung haben.

bullets.title: Leistungsfähige Suche, Synchronisation und mehr
bullets.description: Durch eine äußerst leistungsfähige Indexierung, MapReduce in Echtzeit und eine Apache Lucene-basierte Volltextsuche vereinfacht Cloudant NoSQL DB das Hinzufügen einer erweiterten Datenanalyse und eines leistungsfähigen Datenzugriffs.  Der Datenzugriff kann auch auf Cloudant Sync erweitert werden; damit erfolgt der Datenzugriff über mobile Geräte und Client-Apps können online oder offline ausgeführt werden.

plans.description: Dieser Plan stellt ein Cloudant-Konto auf einem freigegebenen Cloudant-Cluster bereit. Dieser Plan ermöglicht bis zu 20 GB freien Datenspeicher mit 100.000 komplexen API-Aufrufen und 500.000 einfachen API-Aufrufen pro Monat kostenlos. Eine Nutzung, die über die kostenlose Preisstufe hinausgeht, wird gemäß der Details zur Preisstruktur in Rechnung gestellt.

bullets: 20 GB Datenspeicher kostenlos
500.000 einfache API-Aufrufe pro Monat kostenlos
100.000 komplexe API-Aufrufe pro Monat kostenlos

es.description: Cloudant NoSQL DB ofrece acceso a una capa de datos JSON de NoSQL completamente gestionadas que siempre están activos. Este servicio es compatible con CouchDB y se puede acceder al mismo a través de una interfaz HTTP fácil de utilizar para modelos de aplicaciones móviles web.

metadata.longDescription: Cloudant NoSQL DB ofrece acceso a una capa de datos JSON de NoSQL completamente gestionadas que siempre están activos. Este servicio es compatible con CouchDB y se puede acceder al mismo a través de una interfaz HTTP fácil de utilizar para modelos de aplicaciones móviles web.

bullets.title: Facilidad de uso
bullets.description: Trabaje con documentos JSON autodescriptivos mediante una API RESTful que facilita el acceso a cada documento de la base de datos Cloudant como JSON a través de un URL. Los documentos se pueden recuperar, almacenar o suprimir individualmente o de forma masiva y también pueden tener archivos adjuntos. IBM se encarga del suministro, gestión y escalabilidad del almacén de datos para que el usuario se pueda centrar en la aplicación.

bullets.title: Potente búsqueda, sincronización y más
bullets.description: Con un sistema de índices realmente potente y búsqueda de texto completo en tiempo real basada en MapReduce y Apache Lucene, Cloudant NoSQL DB permite añadir analíticas de datos avanzadas y ofrece un robusto sistema de acceso a los datos. El acceso a los datos también se puede extender a Cloudant Sync, lo que permite el acceso a los datos para dispositivos móviles y apps de cliente que se ejecuten conectados o fuera de línea.

plans.description: Este plan ofrece una cuenta Cloudant en un clúster compartido de Cloudant. Este plan ofrece hasta 20 GB de almacenamiento de datos gratuitos con 100.000 llamadas pesadas a las API y 500.000 llamadas ligeras a las API gratuitas al mes. El uso por encima de este nivel se cargará según los detalles de la lista de precios.

bullets: 20 GB de almacenamiento de datos gratuitos
500.000 llamadas ligeras a API gratis al mes
100.000 llamadas pesadas a API gratis al mes

fr.description: Cloudant NoSQL DB fournit l'accès à une couche de données NoSQL JSON toujours active. Ce service est compatible avec CouchDB et accessible via une interface HTTP facile à utiliser pour les modèles d'application mobile et Web.

metadata.longDescription: Cloudant NoSQL DB fournit l'accès à une couche de données NoSQL JSON toujours active. Ce service est compatible avec CouchDB et accessible via une interface HTTP facile à utiliser pour les modèles d'application mobile et Web.

bullets.title: Simplicité d'utilisation
bullets.description: Utilisez des documents JSON qui s'auto-décrivent via une API RESTful qui rend chaque document de votre base de données Cloudant accessible sous forme d'adresse URL au format JSON. Les documents peuvent être extraits, stockés ou supprimés individuellement ou par lots et avoir des fichiers joints. IBM s'occupe de la mise à disposition, de la gestion et de l'évolutivité du magasin de données, pour que vous puissiez vous consacrer pleinement à votre application.

bullets.title: Une recherche et une synchronisation puissantes, entre autres
bullets.description: Grâce à une indexation extrêmement puissante et une fonction de recherche en texte intégral reposant sur MapReduce et Apache Lucene en temps réel, Cloudant NoSQL DB facilite l'ajout d'analyses de données avancées et permet un accès aux données efficace. L'accès aux données peut également être étendu à Cloudant Sync, pour un accès aux données depuis des périphériques mobiles et des applications client en ligne ou hors ligne.

plans.description: Ce plan met à disposition un compte Cloudant dans un cluster Cloudant partagé. Il propose jusqu'à 20 Go de stockage de données gratuit avec 100000 appels d'API lourds et 500000 appels d'API légers par mois gratuits. Au-délà de cette franchise, l'utilisation est facturée selon la tarification en vigueur.

bullets: 20 Go de stockage de données gratuits
500000 appels d'API légers gratuits par mois
100000 appels d'API lourds gratuits par mois

it.description: Cloudant NoSQL DB fornisce l'accesso a un livello di dati JSON NoSQL interamente gestito che è sempre attivo. Questo servizio è compatibile con CouchDB ed è accessibile tramite una semplice interfaccia HTTP per i modelli di applicazioni mobili e Web

metadata.longDescription: Cloudant NoSQL DB fornisce l'accesso a un livello di dati JSON NoSQL interamente gestito che è sempre attivo. Questo servizio è compatibile con CouchDB ed è accessibile tramite una semplice interfaccia HTTP per i modelli di applicazioni mobili e Web

bullets.title: Facilità di utilizzo
bullets.description: Gestire i documenti JSON auto-descrittivi tramite una API RESTful che rende ogni documento nel database Cloudant accessibile in formato JSON tramite un URL.  I documenti possono essere recuperati, archiviati o eliminati singolarmente o in blocco e possono avere anche dei file allegati. IBM si occupa del provisioning, della gestione e della scalabilità dell'archivio dati, lasciando agli utenti il tempo di concentrarsi sulla propria applicazione.

bullets.title: Ricerca avanzata, sincronizzazione e molto altro
bullets.description: Grazie a un'indicizzazione molto potente, al MapReduce in tempo reale e alla ricerca globale basata su Apache Lucene, Cloudant NoSQL DB semplifica l'aggiunta dell'analisi di dati avanzata e di un potente accesso ai dati.  L'accesso ai dati può essere esteso anche a Cloudant Sync, consentendo l'accesso ai dati da dispositivi mobili e applicazioni client per l'esecuzione in linea o non linea.

plans.description: Questo piano consente di effettuare il provisioning di un account Cloudant su un cluster Cloudant condiviso. Questo piano offre fino a 20 GB di archiviazione dati con 100.000 chiamate API Heavy e 500.000 chiamate API Light gratuite al mese. L'utilizzo oltre la soglia gratuita verrà addebitato secondo i dettagli di prezzatura.

bullets: 20 GB di archiviazione dati
500.000 chiamate API Light gratuite al mese
100.000 chiamate API Heavy gratuite al mese

ja.description: Cloudant NoSQL DB は、常に稼働している完全管理 NoSQL JSON データ層へのアクセスを提供します。このサービスは CouchDB と互換性があり、モバイル・モデルおよび Web アプリケーション・モデルの HTTP インターフェースを使用して簡単にアクセスできます。

metadata.longDescription: Cloudant NoSQL DB は、常に稼働している完全管理 NoSQL JSON データ層へのアクセスを提供します。このサービスは CouchDB と互換性があり、モバイル・モデルおよび Web アプリケーション・モデルの HTTP インターフェースを使用して簡単にアクセスできます。

bullets.title: 使いやすさ
bullets.description: RESTful API を通じて自己記述型 JSON 文書を処理できます。この API により、URL を介して JSON として Cloudant データベース内のすべての文書にアクセスできます。文書は、個別にまたは一括して取得、保管、または削除でき、ファイルを添付することもできます。IBM は、データ・ストアのプロビジョニング、管理、およびスケーラビリティーを支援し、お客様がアプリケーションに注力できるようにします。

bullets.title: 強力な検索、同期など
bullets.description: 非常に強力な索引作成、リアルタイムの MapReduce および Apache Lucene ベースの全文検索、および Cloudant NoSQL DB により、高度なデータ分析および強力なデータ・アクセスを簡単に追加できます。またデータ・アクセスは Cloudant Sync に拡張でき、これにより、モバイル・デバイスおよびクライアント・アプリからのデータ・アクセスをオンラインまたはオフラインで実行できます。

plans.description: このプランは、共有 Cloudant Cluster の Cloudant アカウントをプロビジョンします。このプランでは、最大 20GB の無料データ・ストレージが提供され、さらに毎月 100,000 の高負荷 API 呼び出し、および 500,000 の軽負荷 API 呼び出しを無料で利用できます。無料分を超えた使用量に対しては、料金詳細に従い課金されます。

bullets: 20 GB の無料データ・ストレージ
毎月 500,000 の無料軽負荷 API 呼び出し
毎月 100,000 の無料高負荷 API 呼び出し

pt-BR.description: O banco de dados Cloudant NoSQL DB fornece acesso a uma camada de dados do NoSQL JSON totalmente gerenciada que sempre está ativa. Esse serviço é compatível com o CouchDB e acessível por meio de uma interface HTTP simples de usar para modelos de aplicativos móveis e da web

metadata.longDescription: O banco de dados Cloudant NoSQL DB fornece acesso a uma camada de dados do NoSQL JSON totalmente gerenciada que sempre está ativa. Esse serviço é compatível com o CouchDB e acessível por meio de uma interface HTTP simples de usar para modelos de aplicativos móveis e da web

bullets.title: Facilidade de uso
bullets.description: Trabalhe com documentos JSON auto-descritivos por meio de uma API RESTful que torna todos os documentos no seu banco de dados Cloudant acessíveis como JSON via uma URL.  Os documentos podem ser recuperados, armazenados ou excluídos individualmente ou em lote e também podem ter arquivos anexados. A IBM cuida do fornecimento, gerenciamento e escalabilidade do armazenamento de dados, liberando seu tempo para focar em seu aplicativo.

bullets.title: Procura poderosa, sincronização e mais
bullets.description: Com indexação extremamente poderosa, a procura de texto completo em tempo real baseada em MapReduce e Apache Lucene, o banco de dados Cloudant NoSQL facilita incluir analítica de dados avançada e poderoso acesso a dados.  O acesso a dados também pode se estender ao Cloudant Sync, permitindo que o acesso a dados a partir de dispositivos móveis e apps de cliente executem conectados ou offline.

plans.description: Esse plano fornece uma conta do Cloudant em um Cloudant Cluster compartilhado. Esse plano permite até 20GB de armazenamento de dados gratuito com 100.000 chamadas de API pesadas e 500.000 chamadas de API leves por mês gratuitas. O uso acima da camada gratuita pode ser cobrado de acordo com os detalhes de preços.

bullets: 20 GB de armazenamento de dados gratuito
500.000 chamadas de API leves gratuitas por mês
100.000 chamadas de API pesadas gratuitas por mês

zh-Hans.description: Cloudant NoSQL 数据库提供对始终启用的完全受管 NoSQL JSON 数据层的访问。此服务与 CouchDB 兼容，且可通过移动和 Web 应用程序模型的易于使用的 HTTP 界面进行访问。

metadata.longDescription: Cloudant NoSQL 数据库提供对始终启用的完全受管 NoSQL JSON 数据层的访问。此服务与 CouchDB 兼容，且可通过移动和 Web 应用程序模型的易于使用的 HTTP 界面进行访问。

bullets.title: 易于使用
bullets.description: 通过 RESTful API 使用自描述 JSON 文档，此 API 使 Cloudant 数据库中每个文档可通过 URL 作为 JSON 访问。可以单独或批量检索、存储或删除文档，也可以向文档附加文件。IBM 负责数据存储的供应、管理和可伸缩性，使您可节省时间，重点关注您的应用程序。

bullets.title: 强大的搜索、同步和其他功能
bullets.description: Cloudant NoSQL 数据库提供了强大的索引建立功能以及实时 MapReduce 和 Apache 基于 Lucene 的全文搜索功能，便于执行高级数据分析和强大的数据访问。数据访问也可扩展到 Cloudant 同步，从而实现从联机运行或脱机运行的移动设备和客户机应用程序访问数据的功能。

plans.description: 此计划在共享 Cloudant 集群上供应 Cloudant 帐户。此计划允许每月免费使用多达 20 GB 数据存储空间，以及 100,000 个频繁 API 调用和 500,000 个稀少 API 调用。将根据定价详情对非免费使用收取费用。

bullets: 20 GB 免费数据存储空间
每个 500,000 个稀少 API 调用
每个 100,000 个频繁 API 调用

zh-Hant.description: Cloudant NoSQL DB 可讓您存取一直開啟的完全受管理 NoSQL JSON 資料層。此服務與 CouchDB 相容，而且可透過行動式及 Web 應用程式模型的易用 HTTP 介面來存取。

metadata.longDescription: Cloudant NoSQL DB 可讓您存取一律開啟的完全受管理 NoSQL JSON 資料層。此服務與 CouchDB 相容，而且可透過行動式及 Web 應用程式模型的易用 HTTP 介面來存取。

bullets.title: 易於使用
bullets.description: 透過 RESTful API 使用自我說明的 JSON 文件，而此 API 可讓 Cloudant 資料庫中的每一份文件當作 JSON 透過 URL 存取。可以個別或整批擷取、儲存或刪除文件，也可以附加檔案。IBM 會處理資料儲存庫的佈建、管理及可延展性，您便可以全心專注於應用程式。

bullets.title: 強大的搜尋、同步及其他
bullets.description: 透過極其強大的檢索（即時 MapReduce 及 Apache Lucene 型全文搜尋），Cloudant NoSQL DB 可讓您輕易地新增進階資料分析及強大的資料存取。資料存取也可以延伸至「Cloudant 同步」，讓您可從行動式裝置存取資料，以及讓應用程式可以連線或離線執行。

plans.description: 此方案會在共用的「Cloudant 叢集」上佈建一個 Cloudant 帳號。此方案容許高達 20GB 的免費資料儲存體，同時每個月有免費的 100,000 次「重量型 API」呼叫及 500,000 次「輕量型 API」呼叫。用量若超出免費層級，將根據定價詳細資料收費。

bullets: 20 GB 的免費資料儲存體
每個月 500,000 次輕量型 API 呼叫
每個月 100,000 次重量型 API 呼叫

ko.description: Cloudant NoSQL DB는 항상 작동 중인, 전체 관리되는 NoSQL JSON 데이터 계층에 대한 액세스를 제공합니다. 이 서비스는 CouchDB와 호환 가능하며, 모바일 및 웹 애플리케이션 모델에 대한 사용하기 쉬운 HTTP 인터���이스를 통해 액세스할 수 있습니다.

metadata.longDescription: Cloudant NoSQL DB는 항상 작동 중인, 전체 관리되는 NoSQL JSON 데이터 계층에 대한 액세스를 제공합니다. 이 서비스는 CouchDB와 호환 가능하며, 모바일 및 웹 애플리케이션 모델에 대한 사용하기 쉬운 HTTP 인터페이스를 통해 액세스할 수 있습니다.

bullets.title: 사용 용이성
bullets.description: URL을 통해 JSON으로 Cloudant 데이터베이스에 있는 모든 문서를 액세스할 수 있게 하는 RESTful API를 통해 자기 서술적인 JSON 문서에 대해 작업합니다. 문서를 개별적으로 또는 벌크로 검색하거나 저장하거나 삭제할 수 있으며, 파일을 첨부할 수도 있습니다. IBM은 데이터 저장소의 프로비저닝, 관리 및 확장성을 처리하여 사용자가 애플리케이션에 집중할 수 있도록 여유 시간을 제공합니다.

bullets.title: 강력한 검색, 동기화 그 이상을 제공합니다.
bullets.description: 매우 강력한 색인화, 실시간 MapReduce 및 Apache Lucene 기반 전체 텍스트 검색 기능을 사용하여, Cloudant NoSQL DB에서 고급 데이터 분석 및 강력한 데이터 액세스를 쉽게 추가할 수 있습니다. 또한 Cloudant Sync로 데이터 액세스를 확장하여, 모바일 디바이스 및 클라이언트 앱의 데이터 액세스를 연결된 상태 또는 오프라인으로 실행 가능하게 할 수 있습니다.

plans.description: 이 계획은 공유 Cloudant 클러스터의 Cloudant 계정을 프로비저닝합니다. 매월 무료로 100,000번의 Heavy API 호출 및 500,000번의 Light API 호출이 가능한 최대 20GB의 데이터 스토리지를 허용합니다. 무료 사용량 이상을 사용하는 경우 가격 책정 세부사항에 따라 청구됩니다.

bullets: 20GB의 여유 데이터 스토리지
매월 무료로 500,000번의 Light API 호출
매월 무료로 100,000번의 Heavy API 호출

bullets.title: Ease of Use
bullets.description: Work with self-describing JSON documents through a RESTful API that makes every document in your Cloudant database accessible as JSON via a URL.  Documents can be retrieved, stored, or deleted individually or in bulk and can also have files attached. IBM takes care of the provisioning, management, and scalability of the data store, freeing up your time to focus on your application.

bullets.title: Powerful search, sync and more
bullets.description: With extremely powerful indexing, real time MapReduce and Apache Lucene-based full-text search, Cloudant NoSQL DB makes it easy to add advanced data analytics and powerful data access.  Data access can also extend to Cloudant Sync, enabling data access from mobile devices and client apps to run connected or off-line.

Database Permissions

entity.label: Cognitive Commerce™
entity.description: Cognitive Commerce is a service provided by Cognitive Scale.

extra.notCreatableMessage: Enter your email address to learn more.
extra.notCreatableRobotMessage: This service is available in closed Beta from Cognitive Scale.
extra.longDescription: Cognitive insights and advice fuel personalized and contextual commerce opportunities for consumers and businesses and provide more relevant and actionable recommendations. Cognitive Commerce™, a service provided by Cognitive Scale, provides the next level of fulfillment and helps drive commercial transactions.

bullets.title: Intelligent, Self-Learning Systems
bullets.description: Using data mining, analysis, pattern recognition and natural language processing

bullets.title: Industry specific content
bullets.description: Navigate through multi structured data including text, images and video to generate actionable insights from "Dark Data" – data that is not machine readable, not easily accessible, or not leveraged

bullets.title: Location Aware
bullets.description: Surface context-relevant offers, deals and recommendations

bullets.title: Built on Open Standards
bullets.description: Offers complete data security, sovereignty, and transparency while maintaining maximum flexibility and control over how and where data is stored and accessed.

media.caption: Introducing Cognitive Scale
Cognitive Commerce Search
Insights for Commerce

entity.label: Cognitive Graph
entity.description: Cognitive Graph is a service provided by Cognitive Scale.

extra.notCreatableMessage: Enter your email address to learn more.
extra.notCreatableRobotMessage: This service is available in closed Beta from Cognitive Scale.
extra.longDescription: A service provided by Cognitive Scale, Cognitive Graphs are an encapsulation of knowledge, sourced from 3rd party, internal, and private data sources, using domain specific models, into a query-able graph representation. Sourcing Agents pull, enrich, transform, and map, multi-structured and dark data, using machine learning techniques. The Cognitive Graph can be projected in multiple ways to be applied to different problem sets.

bullets.title: Auto evolving and learning
bullets.description: The Graph is rapidly updated as new data streams in, models evolve, and new concepts are learned, to create living applications.

bullets.title: Universal Understanding
bullets.description: The Graph fuses domain specific concept-relationship ontologies with a representation of natural language, providing a stable and unified basis for storing knowledge.

bullets.title: Traceability
bullets.description: Knowledge represented in the Graph can be traced all the way back to the original data sources, through all levels of enrichment, to provide authenticity and visibility into the data lineage backing the applications.

media.caption: Introducing Cognitive Scale
Sourcing Data
Exploring the Graph

entity.label: Cognitive Insights™
entity.description: Cognitive Insights™ is a service provided by Cognitive Scale.

extra.notCreatableMessage: Enter your email address to learn more.
extra.notCreatableRobotMessage: This service is available in closed Beta from Cognitive Scale.
extra.longDescription: A service provided by Cognitive Scale, Cognitive Insights are contextually relevant and personalized observations or predictions, presented with a recommendation, with the purpose of invoking user action. An insight serves to augment the knowledge, perception, and awareness of the end user, with the goal of improving their efficiency, decisions, and ability to quickly react to emerging scenarios. This service, when used in conjunction with a basis of knowledge and  real-time data provided by the cognitive graph, can be used to power end-user applications.

bullets.title: Relevant
bullets.description: Insights are prioritized by comparing the impact and confidence in the prediction, within the context of a domain model applied to realtime data.

bullets.title: Personalized
bullets.description: An ever-growing user profile is used to improve the relevance of the insights surfaced.

bullets.title: Learning
bullets.description: Insights can get smarter when the end user provides feedback to validate the insight.

media.caption: Introducing Cognitive Scale
Cognitive Insights for Healthcare
Cognitive Insights for Retail

entity.label: concept_expansion

extra.longDescription: Concept Expansion analyzes text and learns similar terms (words or phrases) based on context.  It helps users to rapidly create a lexicon (a set of related terms) from a data set of text fragments. The output can be used to provide further understanding of data and  improve text analytics pipelines.

entity.label: concept_insights
entity.description: Explore the concepts behind your input, identifying associations beyond traditional text matching.

extra.longDescription: The Concept Insights service links documents that you provide with a pre-existing graph of concepts based on Wikipedia (e.g. 'The New York Times', 'Machine learning', etc.). Two types of links are identified: explicit links when a document directly mentions a concept, and implicit links which connect your documents to relevant concepts that are not directly mentioned in them. Users of this service can also search for documents that are relevant to a concept or collection of concepts by exploring the explicit and implicit links.

media.caption: Dashboard Screenshot
Dashboard Stats
TED Demo

metadata.longDescription: O serviço Concept Insights vincula documentos que você fornece a um gráfico preexistente de conceitos baseados no Wikipedia (por exemplo, 'The New York Times', 'Aprendizado de máquina', etc.). Dois tipos de links são identificados: links explícitos quando um documento menciona diretamente um conceito e links implícitos que conectam seus documentos a conceitos relevantes que não são mencionados diretamente neles. Os usuários desse serviço também podem procurar documentos que são relevantes para um conceito ou coleção de conceitos, explorando os links explícitos e implícitos.

pt-BR.description: Explore os conceitos por trás de sua entrada, identificando associações além da correspondência de texto tradicional.

metadata.longDescription: 随预先存在的概念图（基于 Wikipedia）一起提供的 Concept Insights 服务链接文档（例如，“The New York Times”、“Machine learning”等）。这里介绍了两种类型的链接：文档直接提及某个概念时的显式链接，以及将文档连接到其中未直接提及的相关概念的隐式链接。此服务的用户还可以通过探索显式和隐式链接来搜索与某个概念或概念集合相关的文档。

zh-Hans.description: 探索您的输入所暗含的概念，以确定出超出传统文本匹配的关联。

metadata.longDescription: Concept Insights 服務可以將您所提供的文件，與基於維基百科的既有概念圖形（例如「紐約時報」、「機器學習」等）鏈結。識別兩種類型的鏈結：明確的鏈結（文件直接提及概念時）和隱含的鏈結（將文件連接至文件中未直接提及的相關概念）。此服務的使用者也可以透過探索明確及隱含的鏈結，來搜尋與概念或概念集合相關的文件。

metadata.longDescription: Der Concept Insights-Service verlinkt Dokumente, die Sie mit einem vorab vorhandenen Diagrammkonzept basierend auf Wikipedia (z.B. 'The New York Times', 'Machine Learning' usw.) bereit stellen. Zwei Typen von Links werden identifiziert: explizite Links, wenn ein Dokument ein Konzept direkt erwähnt, und  implizite Links, die Ihre Dokumente mit relevanten Konzepten (die nicht direkt in den Dokumenten erwähnt sind) verknüpfen. Benutzer dieses Service können auch nach Dokumenten suchen, die für ein Konzept oder eine Sammlung von Konzepten relevant sind, indem die expliziten und impliziten Links erforscht werden.

de.description: Erforscht die Konzepte hinter Ihrer Eingabe, indem Assoziationen identifiziert werden, die über die traditionelle Textübereinstimmung hinausgehen.

metadata.longDescription: El servicio de Concept Insights enlaza documentos que usted proporciona con un gráfico preexistente de conceptos basado en Wikipedia (por ejemplo, 'The New York Times', 'Aprendizaje de máquina', etc).. Se identifican dos tipos de enlaces: enlaces explícitos cuando un documento hace una mención explícita de un concepto, y enlaces implícitos que conectan sus documentos con conceptos relevantes que no se han mencionado directamente en ellos. Los usuarios de este servicio también pueden buscar documentos relevantes con un concepto o colección de conceptos explorando los enlaces explícitos e implícitos.

es.description: Explore los conceptos que hay detrás de sus entradas, identificando las asociaciones más allá de la coincidencia de texto tradicional.

metadata.longDescription: Le service Concept Insights lie les documents que vous fournissez à un graphique préexistant de concepts basé sur Wikipedia (par exemple, 'The New York Times', 'Apprentissage automatique', etc.). Deux types de liens sont identifiés : les liens explicites, lorsqu'un document mentionne un concept directement, et les liens implicites, qui relient vos documents aux concepts concernés qui n'y sont pas mentionnés directement. Les utilisateurs peuvent également rechercher les documents concernés par un concept ou un ensemble de concepts en explorant les liens explicites et implicites.

fr.description: Explorez les concepts derrière vos entrées, en identifiant les associations au-delà de la correspondance de texte traditionnelle.

metadata.longDescription: Il servizio Concept Insights collega i documenti forniti dall'utente a un grafico di concetti preesistente basato su Wikipedia (ad es. 'The New York Times', 'Apprendimento automatico' ecc.). Sono identificati due tipi di collegamenti: collegamenti espliciti quando un documento menziona direttamente un concetto e collegamenti impliciti che connettono i documenti ai concetti pertinenti che non sono menzionati direttamente in essi. Gli utenti di questo servizio possono anche cercare documenti pertinenti a un concetto o a una raccolta di concetti esplorando i collegamenti espliciti e impliciti.

it.description: Esplorare i concetti che motivano l'input dell'utente, identificando associazioni che vanno oltre la tradizionale corrispondenza di testo.

metadata.longDescription: Concept Insights サービスは、提供された文書を、Wikipedia に基づく既存の概念グラフにリンクします (「The New York Times」、「Machine learning」など)。 リンクには 2 種類あります。1 つは明示リンクで、これは概念が文書で直接言及されている場合のものです。もう 1 つは暗黙リンクで、これは文書をその中で直接言及されていない関連概念に結びつけるためのものです。 このサービスのユーザーは、明示リンクと暗黙リンクを調べて、ある概念、または概念の集合に関連した文書を探すこともできます。

ja.description: 入力内容の背後にある概念を探索し、従来型のテキスト・マッチングを超えた関連性を明らかにします。

metadata.longDescription: Concept Insights 서비스는 사용자가 제공하는 문서를 Wikipedia를 기반으로 하는 개념의 기존 그래프에 링크합니다(예: 'The New York Times', 'Machine learning' 등). 링크에는 두 가지 유형이 있습니다. 문서가 개념을 직접 언급하는 명시적 링크와, 개념을 직접 언급하지 않는 문서를 관련 개념에 연결하는 내재된 링크입니다. 이 서비스의 사용자는 또한 명시적 및 내재된 링크를 탐색하여 개념에 관련된 문서 또는 개념의 콜렉션을 사용할 수도 있습니다.

ko.description: 일반적인 텍스트 일치 이상의 연관을 식별하여 사용자 입력의 배후 개념을 탐색합니다.

entity.label: cpy-insights

extra.longDescription: Business analytics for the proactive enterprise. Connect and monitor business activities in and across your Bluemix© applications, define KPI targets and receive notifications every time a work item requires action.

entity.label: dashDB
entity.description: A data warehouse with lots of storage, flexibility, and power. Discover the insights revealed from within your data or data from other cloud services by using our built-in analytics or by connecting your own apps.

extra.longDescription: dashDB is a data warehousing and analytics solution. Use dashDB to store relational data, including special types such as geospatial data. Then analyze that data with SQL or advanced built-in analytics like predictive analytics and data mining, analytics with R, and geospatial analytics. You can leverage the in-memory database technology to use both columnar and row-based tables.

bullets.title: Powered by IBM BLU Acceleration and Netezza in-Database Analytics
bullets.description: IBM BLU Acceleration is fast and simple. It uses dynamic in-memory columnar technology and innovations such as actionable compression to rapidly scan and return relevant data. In-database analytic algorithms integrated from Netezza bring simplicity and performance to advanced analytics.

bullets.title: Connectivity
bullets.description: dashDB is built to connect easily to all of your services and applications. You can start analyzing your data right away with familiar tools.

entity.label: DataCache
entity.description: Improve the performance and user experience of web applications by retrieving information from fast, managed, in-memory caches, instead of relying entirely on slower disk-based databases.

extra.longDescription: Improve the performance and user experience of web applications by retrieving information from fast, managed, in-memory caches, instead of relying entirely on slower disk-based databases.

bullets.title: CRUD operations
bullets.description: Remotely leverages the caching capabilities of the data grid and let you perform create, retrieve, update and delete operations.

bullets.title: NoSQL style in memory grid
bullets.description: Provides a NoSQL style distributed key-value storage service in memory.

bullets.title: Linear and scalable
bullets.description: Provides linear scalability, predictable performance and fault tolerance of the web application's data requirements.

entity.label: dialog
entity.description: Enable your application to use natural language to converse with users

extra.longDescription: The IBM Watson Dialog Service allows a developer to design the way an application interacts with an end user through a conversational interface. The Dialog service enables applications to use natural language to automatically respond to user questions, cross-sell and up-sell, walk users through processes or applications, or even hand-hold users through difficult tasks. The Dialog service can track and store user profile information to learn more about end users, guide them through processes based on their unique situation, or pass their information to a back-end system to help them take action and get the help they need.

media.caption: Dialog enables natural conversations with your users

metadata.longDescription: O IBM Watson Dialog Service permite que um desenvolvedor projete a forma como um aplicativo interage com o usuário final por meio de uma interface de conversação. O serviço Dialog permite que os aplicativos usem a língua natural para responder automaticamente a perguntas de usuários, venda cruzada e up-sell, guie os usuários por meio de processos ou aplicativos ou mesmo usuários hand-hold por meio de tarefas difíceis. O serviço Dialog pode controlar e armazenar informações de perfil de usuário para saber mais sobre os usuários finais, guiá-los por meio de processos com base em sua única situação, ou passar suas informações para um sistema back-end para ajudá-los a agir e obter a ajuda que necessitam.

media.caption: O Dialog permite conversas naturais com seus usuários

pt-BR.description: Ative seu aplicativo para usar a língua natural para conversar com usuários

metadata.longDescription: IBM Watson Dialog 服务允许开发人员设计一种方法，通过此方法，应用程序可以通过会话式界面与最终用户交互。Dialog 服务能使应用程序以自然语言自动回答用户问题、交叉销售和追加销售，引导用户完成过程或应用程序，甚至能辅���用户完成较困难的任务。Dialog 服务可以跟踪和存储用户概要文件信息，以更深入地了解最终用户，引导用户根据具体情况完成过程，或将其信息传递到后端系统，帮助他们采取行动并获取所需的帮助。

metadata.longDescription: 利用 IBM Watson Dialog 服務，開發人員可以設計應用程式與一般使用者透過交談式介面來進行互動的方式。Dialog 服務能讓應用程式使用自然語言自動回應使用者問題、交叉銷售與追加銷售、引導使用者逐步演練程序或應用程式，甚或協助使用者完成困難作業。Dialog 服務可以追蹤及儲存使用者設定檔資訊以進一步瞭解一般使用者，指導他們根據其獨特的狀況完成程序，或將一般使用者的資訊傳遞給後端系統，以協助他們採取動作及取得所需的協助。

metadata.longDescription: Mit dem IBM Watson Dialog-Service kann ein Entwickler die Interaktion einer Anwendung mit einem Endbenutzer über eine Dialogschnittstelle anpassen. Mithilfe des Dialog-Service können Anwendungen in natürlicher Sprache automatisch auf Benutzerfragen antworten, Cross-Selling- und Up-Selling-Aktionen durchführen, Benutzern Prozesse oder Anwendungen schrittweise erläutern oder Benutzer bei komplizierten Aufgaben unterstützen. Der Dialog-Service kann Benutzerprofildaten verfolgen und speichern, um so detaillierte Informationen über Endbenutzer zu erhalten, speziell auf die jeweilige Situation der Benutzer zugeschnittene Anleitungen zur Prozessausführung bereitzustellen oder die Informationen an ein Back-End-System weiterzuleiten, damit die Benutzer geeignete Maßnahmen ergreifen und Unterstützung anfordern können.

media.caption: Dialog ermöglicht die Kommunikation mit Benutzern in natürlicher Sprache

de.description: Ermöglichen Sie in Ihrer Anwendung die Verwendung der natürlichen Sprache für den Dialog mit Benutzern.

metadata.longDescription: El servicio IBM Watson Dialog permite a un desarrollador diseñar la forma en que una aplicación interactúa con un usuario final a través de una interfaz conversacional. El servicio Dialog permite a las aplicaciones utilizar el lenguaje natural para responder automáticamente a las preguntas de los usuarios, en venta cruzada y venta dirigida, orientar a los usuarios a través de procesos o aplicaciones, o incluso guiar paso a paso a los usuarios en tareas difíciles. El servicio Dialog puede realizar el seguimiento y almacenar información de los perfiles de usuario para aprender más sobre los usuarios finales, guiarles en los procesos en función de cada situación específica o pasar su información a un sistema de fondo para ayudarles a realizar acciones y conseguir la ayuda que necesitan.

media.caption: Dialog permite entablar conversaciones naturales con los usuarios

es.description: Habilite su aplicación para que utilice el lenguaje natural para conversar con los usuarios

metadata.longDescription: Le service IBM Watson Dialog Service permet aux développeurs de concevoir la façon dont une application interagit avec un utilisateur final à travers une interface de conversation. Ce service permet aux applications d'utiliser le langage naturel pour répondre automatiquement aux questions des utilisateurs, accroître les ventes complémentaires (cross-selling et up-selling), guider les utilisateurs tout au long des processus et des applications, ou même les assister dans les tâches les plus difficiles. Le service Dialog peut suivre et stocker des informations de profil d'utilisateur pour en savoir plus sur les utilisateurs finaux, les guider dans les processus en fonction de leur situation unique, ou bien transmettre leurs informations à un système en arrière-plan pour les aider à agir et à obtenir l'aide dont ils ont besoin.

media.caption: Dialog permet d'entrer en conversation avec vos utilisateurs

fr.description: Permet à votre application d'utiliser le langage naturel pour dialoguer avec les utilisateurs

metadata.longDescription: IBM Watson Dialog Service permette a uno sviluppatore di progettare il modo in cui un'applicazione interagisce con un utente finale attraverso un'interfaccia di conversazione. Con il servizio Dialog le applicazioni possono utilizzare un linguaggio naturale per rispondere automaticamente alle domande degli utenti, condurre l'utente attraverso processi o applicazioni e persino accompagnarlo durante operazioni complesse. Il servizio Dialog tiene traccia e memorizza le informazioni sul profilo dell'utente per saperne di più sugli utenti finali, guidarli attraverso processi in base della situazione personale o passare le loro informazioni a un sistema di back-end per aiutarli a intraprendere azioni e ottenere il supporto necessario.

media.caption: Dialog consente conversazioni naturali con gli utenti

it.description: Consente all'applicazione di utilizzare un linguaggio naturale per conversare con gli utenti

metadata.longDescription: 開発者は、IBM Watson Dialog サービスを使用することにより、会話型インターフェースを用いたアプリケーションとエンド・ユーザーの対話を設計できます。 Dialog サービスでは、ユーザーの質問への自動応答、クロスセルやアップセルの実施、プロセスやアプリケーションについてのユーザーへの説明、難しい作業のガイドなどをアプリケーションが自然言語で行うことが可能です。 Dialog サービスは、ユーザー・プロファイル情報を追跡、保管して、エンド・ユーザーに関する詳しい知識を蓄積し、ユーザー個別の状況に応じてプロセスをガイドします。また、ユーザーに関する情報をバックエンド・シ���テムに渡すことによってユーザーが適切なアクションを取り、必要な助けを得られるようにします。

metadata.longDescription: IBM Watson Dialog Service를 사용하면 애플리케이션이 대화형 인터페이스를 통해 일반 사용자와 상호작용하는 방식으로 개발자가 디자인을 수행할 수 있습니다. Dialog 서비스를 사용하면 애플리케이션이 자연어를 사용하여 자동으로 사용자의 질문에 응답하고 교차 판매, 연쇄 판매를 수행하고 사용자에게 프로세스 또는 애플리케이션을 단계별로 보여줄 수 있습니다. 심지어 핸드 홀드 사용자가 어려운 태스크를 수행할 수도 있습니다. Dialog 서비스는 사용자 프로파일 정보를 수집하고 저장하여 일반 사용자를 더 잘 파악하여 사용자의 고유한 상황을 기반으로 하여 프로세스를 단계별로 안내하거나 사용자의 정보를 백엔드 시스템에 전달하여 사용자가 조치를 취하거나 필요한 도움을 얻을 수 있도록 지원합니다.

entity.description: Generate documents from any standard data source with the Document Generation for Bluemix service.

extra.longDescription: You can connect this service to any application to generate Word, PDF, and HTML documents from any standard data source by using the service REST APIs. You can also create reports from templates by using the Report Builder APIs.

entity.label: dreamface
entity.description: Cloud Application Development Platform

extra.longDescription: DreamFace is a cloud-based development platform that delivers enterprise-grade cloud applications – from development right in the browser to deployment on Web or Mobile with just a click. A team with blended skills can produce Internet Web applications quickly and easily – combining a rich UI, importing and consuming any public or private API, and respecting enterprise-standards for security, scalability and manageability.

entity.label: Elasticsearch by Compose
entity.description: Elasticsearch combines the power of a full text search engine with the indexing strengths of a JSON document database to create a powerful tool for rich data analysis on large volumes of data. With Elasticsearch your searching can be scored for exactness letting you dig through your data set for those close matches and near misses which you could be missing.

extra.longDescription: The most advanced open-source database, hosted in the cloud.

entity.label: erservice
entity.description: IBM Embeddable Reporting for Bluemix provides a mechanism to connect to relational data sources, create reports/dashboard, and embed this service within your application.

extra.longDescription: Include dashboards and reports in your web or mobile application. Author using a simple cloud editor removing the need to understand complex query syntaxes and expressions required for rich visualizations. Then embed reports and dashboards using a wide variety of languages such as Node.js or Java using a RESTful API.

media.caption: Create and manage reports for applications from a single view
Easily create new report packages
Combine different data elements such as complex lists and visualizations into a single report
Samples available in JazzHub for quick starting point

metadata.longDescription: Sie können Dashboards und Berichte in die Web- oder Mobilanwendung einbeziehen. Durch die Verwendung eines einfachen Cloudeditors für die Erstellung ist es nicht mehr erforderlich, die Syntax komplexer Abfragen und Ausdrücke, die für detaillierte Visualisierungen erforderlich sind, im Detail zu kennen. Betten Sie Berichte und Dashboards mithilfe einer Vielzahl verschiedener Sprachen wie Node.js oder Java über eine REST-konforme API ein.

media.caption: Berichte für Anwendungen über eine zentrale Ansicht erstellen und verwalten
Neue Berichtspakete ohne großen Aufwand erstellen
Verschiedene Datenelemente wie z. B. komplexe Listen und Visualisierungen in einem einzelnen Bericht kombinieren

bullets.description: Entwickler, Designer und Produktmanager können auf einfache Weise an datenbasierten Assets, wie z. B. Berichten, die in die Anwendung einbezogen werden sollen, zusammenarbeiten. Hierfür ist es nicht erforderlich, Datenquellen, Visualisierungsengines und Abfragesyntax für verschiedene Quellcodes zu verwalten. Mithilfe der bereitgestellten Cloud-Authoring-Umgebung können Assets erstellt werden, deren Palette von einer einfachen Abfrage zum Anzeigen einer Metrik bis zum Zusammenfügen von Daten aus verschiedenen Datenquellen für ein komplexes Dashboard reicht.
bullets.title: Einfache Authoring-Umgebung

bullets.description: Für das Einbetten einer Berichts oder Dashboards ist nicht mehr erforderlich als eine HTTP-GET-Anforderung über die REST-konforme API. Sie können auf alle erstellten Inhalte über Ihre bevorzugte Methode zugreifen, wobei Ihnen Unterstützung für eine Vielzahl unterschiedlicher Sprachen, Frameworks und Tools zur Verfügung steht. Der Service reduziert die für das Einbetten von Berichten erforderlichen Codeänderungen auf ein Minimum und ermöglicht es Ihnen so, die Daten in einem Bericht mithilfe von Parametern zu ändern.
bullets.title: REST-konforme API

bullets: 200 einfache Berichte pro Monat.
100 komplexe Berichte pro Monat.

plans.name: free
plans.description: Zu den einfachen Berichten gehören HTML-, JSON-, CSV-, XML- und PDF-Berichte. Zu den komplexen Berichten gehören aktive Berichte (MHT) und Microsoft Excel-Berichte.

de.description: IBM Embeddable Reporting for Bluemix stellt einen Mechanismus bereit, mit dem Sie eine Verbindung zu relationalen Datenquellen herstellen, Berichte und Dashboards erstellen und diesen Service in Ihre Anwendung einbetten können.

metadata.longDescription: 在 Web 或移动应用程序中包含仪表板和报表。使用简单云编辑器的作者无需了解丰富可视化所需的复杂查询语法和表达式。使用各种语言（如 Node.js 或 Java）通过 Java API 就可嵌入报表和仪表板。

轻松新建报表数据包
将不同的数据元素（例如，复杂列表和可视化）组合成一张报表

bullets.description: 开发者、设计者和产品经理都可以就基于数据的资产（例如，要包含在应用程序中的报表）进行协作。他们无需管理数据源、可视化引擎和源代码上的查询语法。使用云编写环境，我们可帮助编写多种资产，从用于显示度量的简单查询，一直到连接一个复杂仪表板的多个数据源中的数据。
bullets.title: 简单编写环境

bullets.description: 通过 RESTful API 嵌入报表或仪表板就像使用 HTTP GET 一样轻松。在各种语言、框架和工具的支持下，采用您首选的方法来访问创建的所有内容。该服务将最大限度地减少嵌入报表所需的代码更改，允许您通过参数修改报表中的数据。
bullets.title: RESTful API

bullets: 每个月 200 个轻量级报告。

zh_HANS.description: IBM Embeddable Reporting for Bluemix 提供了一种机制，用于连接到关系数据源、创建报告/仪表板以及将此服务嵌入到应用程序。

metadata.longDescription: ご使用の Web アプリケーションまたはモバイル・アプリケーションにダッシュボードとレポートを組み込みます。 簡単なクラウド・エディターを使用することにより、作成者は豊富な視覚化に必要な複雑なクエリー構文や式を理解しなくて���済みます。 それで、RESTful API を使用して、Node.js または Java などの各種言語によってレポートとダッシュボードを組み込んでください。

media.caption: 1 つのビューから、アプリケーションのレポートを作成および管理
新規のレポート・パッケージを容易に作成

bullets.description: 開発者、設計者、プロダクト・マネージャーは、アプリケーションに含めるレポートなどのデータに基づく資産で、簡単に共同作業を行うことができます。 この共同作業は、データ・ソース、視覚化エンジン、およびソース・コードにおけるクエリー構文の管理をせずに行���ます。 弊社のクラウド・オーサリング環境を使用すると、評価指標を表示するための簡単なクエリーから、高機能なダッシュボードの複数のデータ・ソースに基づくデータの結合に至るまで、幅広い範囲の資産を作成することができます。

metadata.longDescription: Includere i dashboard e i report nell'applicazione Web o mobile. L'autore utilizzando un editor cloud semplice rimuove quanto necessario per comprendere espressioni e sintassi di query complesse richieste per le visualizzazioni. Quindi incorpora i report e dashboard utilizzando un'ampia varietà di linguaggi come ad esempio Node.js o Java utilizzando un'API RESTful.

media.caption: Creare e gestire i report per le applicazioni da una sola vista.
Creare facilmente nuovi package report
Combinare differenti elementi dati come elenchi complessi e visualizzazioni in un singolo report.

bullets.description: Gli sviluppatori, i progettisti, e i responsabili di prodotto possono contribuire facilmente ai dati in base ad asset come i report da includere nell'applicazione. Quindi possono operare in tal modo senza la necessità di gestire origini dati, motori di visualizzazione e sintassi di query nell'ambito del codice origine. Utilizzando l'ambiente di creazione cloud si aiuta l'utente a creare asset che spaziano da una semplice query per la visualizzazione di una metrica all'unione di dati da più origini dati per un dashboard sofisticato.
bullets.title: Ambiente semplice di creazione

bullets.description: L'integrazione di un report o dashboard è facile come un comando GET HTTP mediante un'API RESTful. Accedere al contenuto creato nel modo che si preferisce con il supporto per un'ampia varietà di linguaggi, framework e strumenti. Il servizio rende minime le modifiche al codice richieste per integrare i report consentendo di modificare i dati in un report utilizzando dei parametri.

it.description: IBM Embeddable Reporting for Bluemix fornisce un meccanismo che consente il collegamento ad origini dati relazionali, la creazione di report/dashboard e l'integrazione di tali servizi nell'applicazione dell'utente.

metadata.longDescription: Inclua painéis e relatórios em seu aplicativo móvel ou da web. Crie usando um editor de nuvem simples, removendo a necessidade de entender sintaxes de consulta complexas e expressões requeridas por visualizações ricas. Em seguida, integre relatórios e painéis que usam uma grande variedade de linguagens, como Node.js ou Java, usando uma API RESTful.

Crie facilmente novos pacotes de relatórios

bullets.description: Desenvolvedores, designers e gerentes de produtos podem colaborar facilmente em ativos baseados em dados, como os relatórios a serem incluídos no aplicativo. Eles podem fazê-lo sem a necessidade de gerenciar origens de dados, mecanismos de visualização e sintaxes de consulta em todo o código fonte. Ao usar o nosso ambiente de criação em nuvem, ajudamos os ativos de autor que vão desde uma simples consulta para a exibição de uma métrica a juntar dados de várias origens de dados em um painel sofisticado.

bullets.description: Integrar um relatório ou painel é tão fácil quanto um HTTP GET por meio de nossa API RESTful. Acesse todo o conteúdo que você criou da maneira que preferir com suporte para uma grande variedade de linguagens, estruturas e ferramentas. O serviço minimiza as mudanças de código requeridas para integrar relatórios, permitindo a modificação dos dados em um relatório por meio de parâmetros.
